SELECT TB.TP_CATEGORY , TB.DS_TITLE , TB.ID_REG_EMP , SU.USER_NM AS NM_REG_EMP , TO_CHAR(TB.DT_REG, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DT_REG , TB.ID_BULLETIN FROM TBS_BULLETIN TB LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_USER SU ON SU.USER_ID = TB.ID_REG_EMP WHERE 1 = 1 AND TP_BULLETIN = '01' /* (01:FAQ) */
AND DT_REG >= TO_DATE (#{DT_REG_START} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') /* 기간검색(FROM) */
AND DT_REG <= TO_DATE (#{DT_REG_END} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') /* 기간검색(TO) */
AND ID_REG_EMP = #{ID_REG_EMP} /* 등록자 */
AND (DS_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{DS_TITLE} ||'%' OR DS_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{DS_TITLE} ||'%') /* 제목+내용 */
AND TP_CATEGORY = #{TP_CATEGORY} /* 카테고리 */
AND FG_DEL = 'N' ORDER BY DT_REG DESC
mapper.select: SELECT TB.TP_CATEGORY , TB.DS_TITLE , TB.DS_CONTENT , TB.DS_CONT_DTL , TB.DT_REG , TB.ID_REG_DEPT , SD.DEPT_NM AS NM_REG_DEPT , TB.ID_REG_EMP , SU.USER_NM AS NM_REG_EMP , TB.DT_UPT , TB.ID_UPT_DEPT , SDU.DEPT_NM AS NM_UPT_DEPT , TB.ID_UPT_EMP , SUU.USER_NM AS NM_UPT_EMP FROM TBS_BULLETIN TB LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_DEPARTMENT SD ON TB.ID_REG_DEPT = SD.DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_USER SU ON TB.ID_REG_EMP = SU.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_DEPARTMENT SDU ON TB.ID_UPT_DEPT = SDU.DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_USER SUU ON TB.ID_UPT_EMP = SUU.USER_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND TP_BULLETIN = '01' /* (01:FAQ)게시판구분 */ AND ID_BULLETIN = #{ID_BULLETIN} /* 게시판ID */
mapper.sql: SELECT CODE FROM (SELECT CODE , CODE_NAME , PARENT_CODE , SORT_ORDER FROM (SELECT CD_COMP CODE , NM_COMP CODE_NAME , SORT_ORDER , CD_COMP_UP PARENT_CODE , '600001' AS CD_COMP FROM SYS_COMPANY WHERE CNT_LEVEL = 1 AND STATUS = 'A' UNION ALL SELECT CD_COMP , NM_COMP , SORT_ORDER , CD_COMP_UP , '500001' AS CD_COMP FROM SYS_COMPANY WHERE CNT_LEVEL = 1 AND STATUS = 'A' UNION ALL SELECT CD_COMP , NM_COMP , SORT_ORDER , CD_COMP_UP , CD_COMP AS CD_COMP FROM SYS_COMPANY WHERE CNT_LEVEL = 1 AND STATUS = 'A' ) WHERE SUBSTR(CD_COMP,1,6) IN (SELECT SUBSTR(GRP_MAP_ID_1,1,6) FROM AP_ROLE_GROUP WHERE USER_ID = #{user.id}) ORDER BY 4 )
mapper.select: SELECT ROLE_ID FROM AP_ROLE_GROUP WHERE USER_ID=#{user.id} GROUP BY ROLE_ID

SELECT ID_CATEGORY_FAQ AS ID , NM_CATEGORY_FAQ AS TITLE , ID_CATEGORY_FAQ AS KEY , NM_CATEGORY_FAQ AS TOOL_TIP , ID_TEXT_FAQ , '00' AS PARENT_ID , '1' AS DEPTH , 'N' AS FOLDER_YN FROM SYS_FAQ_CATEGORY WHERE 1=1 AND FG_DEL = 'N'

SELECT ID_CATEGORY_FAQ , NM_CATEGORY_FAQ , ID_TEXT_FAQ , FG_DEL , DT_REG , ID_REG_DEPT , ID_REG_EMP , DT_UPT , ID_UPT_DEPT , ID_UPT_EMP FROM SYS_FAQ_CATEGORY WHERE 1=1 AND FG_DEL = 'N' AND ID_CATEGORY_FAQ = #{LAZY_KEY}
mapper.sql:
SELECT ID_CATEGORY_FAQ , NM_CATEGORY_FAQ , ID_TEXT_FAQ FROM SYS_FAQ_CATEGORY WHERE 1=1 AND FG_DEL = 'N'
AND NM_CATEGORY_FAQ LIKE '%' || #{NM_CATEGORY} || '%'
SELECT ID_FAQ , ID_CATEGORY_FAQ , DS_TITLE , DS_CONTENT , FG_DEL FROM SYS_FAQ WHERE ID_CATEGORY_FAQ = #{ID_CATEGORY_FAQ} AND FG_DEL = 'N'
SELECT STF.ID_FAQ , SF.DS_TITLE FROM SYS_TOP_FAQ STF INNER JOIN SYS_FAQ SF ON STF.ID_FAQ = SF.ID_FAQ WHERE 1=1 AND SF.FG_DEL = 'N'

SELECT SF.ID_FAQ , SF.DS_TITLE , SF.DS_CONTENT , SF.FG_DEL FROM SYS_FAQ SF LEFT JOIN SYS_FAQ_KEYWORD SFK ON SF.ID_FAQ = SFK.ID_FAQ WHERE 1=1 AND FG_DEL = 'N'
AND DS_KEYWORD LIKE '%' ||#{NM_FAQ_SEARCH}|| '%'
AND DS_TITLE LIKE '%' ||#{NM_FAQ_SEARCH}|| '%'
AND DS_KEYWORD LIKE '%' ||#{NM_FAQ_SEARCH}|| '%' OR DS_TITLE LIKE '%' ||#{NM_FAQ_SEARCH}|| '%'
GROUP BY SF.ID_FAQ,DS_TITLE,DS_CONTENT,FG_DEL
mapper.select: SELECT SF.ID_FAQ AS ID_FAQ , SFC.NM_CATEGORY_FAQ AS NM_CATEGORY_FAQ , TO_CHAR(SF.DT_UPT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_UPT , SF.ID_UPT_EMP AS ID_UPT_EMP , SF.DS_TITLE AS DS_TITLE , SF.DS_CONTENT AS DS_CONTENT FROM SYS_FAQ SF INNER JOIN SYS_FAQ_CATEGORY SFC ON SF.ID_CATEGORY_FAQ = SFC.ID_CATEGORY_FAQ WHERE 1=1 AND SF.ID_FAQ = #{ID_FAQ}
SELECT ID_FAQ , WM_CONCAT(DS_KEYWORD) AS DS_KEYWORD FROM SYS_FAQ_KEYWORD WHERE 1=1 AND ID_FAQ = #{ID_FAQ} GROUP BY ID_FAQ
mapper.sql:
SELECT STF.ID_FAQ , SF.DS_TITLE FROM SYS_TOP_FAQ STF INNER JOIN SYS_FAQ SF ON STF.ID_FAQ = SF.ID_FAQ WHERE 1=1
AND SF.FG_DEL = 'N' ORDER BY CNT_FAQ DESC
AND SF.FG_DEL = 'N' ORDER BY ID_FAQ ASC
